summary: This mod adds adorable bunnies of assorted colors all over Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
Rabbits of Skyrim
Assets by KANRAx2
Made Standalone, and brought to leveled lists by GrandBulwark

My Mods,
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32363/?]Skyrim Project Stability
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54784/?]Followers Share Knowledge
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54574/?]Conjurer's Friend
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54577/?]Creatures of the Night Revised
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54650/?]Immersive Armors for NPCs Revisted
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55320/?]8-bit Skyrim Theme Music
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55583/?]Resistance Restrictions Removed
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55618/?]Worn Armor Effects
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56183/?]Palace of Kings Rugs Fixed
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58237/?]Better Shrouded Armor - Standalone
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58235/?]Black Dragonscale Hi-Res - Standalone
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57908/?]Evil Incarnate Daedric Gear - Standalone
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58238/?]Glorious Daedric Armory - Standalone
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58233/?]Heroic Dwarven Armory - Standalone
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57999/?]Insanity's Ebony Sword - Standalone
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58322/?]Rabbits of Skyrim
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57973/?]Project Standalone
[/url]
Project's I've Helped with:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9494/?][img]http://www.mygoodeyenyc.com/modImages/skyrim_Warzones/WZonesSignature.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56183/?]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bjmx76D.jpg[/img]
[/url][color=#ffff00]Why the Rabbits though?[/color]
This mod is made from a resource I picked up.  I downloaded it from GendunDrup's Creature Resource compilation [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49682/?]here[/url] and then traced it back to the mod page of origin [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38138/?]here[/url]

It go me curious as to the levels of diversity of rabbits in Skyrim, something I'd not yet paid any attention too.  Well it turns out, there is only a single rabbit actor in Skyrim...  And he, looks like this;
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oKDYlLP.jpg[/img]
What in the hell... Is... That!?

Well, obviously you could replace this model; but then at that point you still only have 1 type of rabbit.  Then of course there is the option of automatic variants, but then you're still facing the problem of that ugly, low poly rabbit model.

[color=#ffff00]So what doe this mod do about it?[/color]
[list=1][*][size=2]Adds three better rabbit models[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Applies 9 Textures to each model[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Adds all 27 of the resulting variants to a sublist[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Distributes the sublist, and thus the rabbits, throughout Skyrim[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
This Video should give you the idea.  Thanks to Matthiaswag for making it!
[youtube]62TxbV_WSJU[/youtube]

[/size]Another Review video brought to you by Thyworm
[youtube]Jv_7OI4z_Fk[/youtube]
[color=#ffff00]Technical Information:[/color]
[list][*][size=2]Rabbits use 1024x1024 textures[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Leveled lists are slightly altered, bashed patch is suggested for people who have other creature mods.[/size][/*]
[/list]
"Be vuwwy vuwwy quiet, I'm hunting wabbits" - Elmer Fudd
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cs7XLgc.gif[/img]

[color=#ffff00][size=2]Credits:[/size][/color]
KANRAx2 for the models and Textures
GrandBulwark for repathing, renaming, making rabbits standalone and distributing in lists

[color=#ffff00]Permissions:[/color]
KANRAx2's Models and Textures are free to use.  Unlike most of my mods, I would like to be asked for permission prior to the .esp in this mod being redistributed, or merged into a larger mod.
author: GrandBulwark

files.name: Rabbits of Skyrim
files.changelogHtml:
Increased the chances for my rabbit in the leveled lists
Integrated my rabbit sublist into several more leveled lists

files.name: Rabbits of Skyrim
files.changelogHtml: Removes conventional rabbits from the spawn lists entirely; this should prevent white rabbits from accumulating in Bashed patches.
